cards: If your life had a theme song, what would it be?
What's one dream you've given up on?
Describe your younger self in three words.
What's a lesson you learned the hard way?
If you could tell your past self one thing, what would it be?
What's something you're proud of but never talk about?
What do you think is your best quality?
Share a moment that changed your perspective on life.
What's something you wish people knew about you?
What's your biggest fear about the future?
If you could master any skill instantly, what would it be?
What's the kindest thing someone has done for you?
Describe your perfect day from start to finish.
What's one thing you want to be remembered for?
Share a belief you used to have that you've changed.
What does happiness look like for you?
If you could relive one day, which would it be?
What's something you're currently struggling with?
What makes you feel most alive?
Share advice you'd give to everyone in this room.
What's a small act of kindness you'll never forget?
If you could have dinner with anyone dead or alive, who and why?
What value do you hold most important in life?
Share a moment when you felt truly understood.
What's something you've learned about yourself recently?
What does success mean to you personally?
What's a risk you wish you had taken?
Share something that brings you peace.
What quality do you admire most in others?
What legacy do you hope to leave behind?
